name: Date Night (Darby Costello)
description:
Submitted for Ludum Dare 41. 

Trey is a hard-working trust fund game developer and all-round ladies man. In his head. Having recently moved to a new city, he’s ready to try new experiences. But when Alice shows up, he gets more than he bargained for. But he still has to try his best to make the date a success. Oh and also he’s trapped in a 1980s point n click adventure, in glorious 1-bit monochrome.
